name: Pokémon Angels
description:
Game description 

Get ready to jump for a new pokemon adventure in BANREL. Collect 8 gym badges

and challenge the pokemon league. Meet different trainers.....catch lots of pokemons. But be aware of the evil team Trident....make up your way to legendary Angelien. Visit different cities. Challenge your rivals. Help many peoples, and defeat the evil trident army. Make your self the very best like no one ever was. Solve various puzzles and make your way to your dreams.
